byline.original: By ELLEN BARRY and JULFIKAR ALI MANIK

abstract: Three bombs explode during procession celebrating Shiite Muslim holiday of Ashura in Dhaka, Bangladesh, killing one and wounding dozens, in what appears to be first attack against Shiites in Bangladesh; social media account operated by Islamic State claims responsibility for attack.
lead_paragraph: The explosions Saturday morning during a procession in the capital were the third act of violence that an Islamic State account has claimed in Bangladesh in the last month.

headline.main: ISIS Claims Responsibility for Attack in Bangladesh
headline.print_headline: Bombs Target Shiites in Bangladesh on Holy Day

snippet: The explosions Saturday morning during a procession in the capital were the third act of violence that an Islamic State account has claimed in Bangladesh in the last month.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
